title: codereview.py broken on windows
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

Attempt publishing a patch using codereview.py on windows OS using hg change command (as
per http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html)

What is the expected output?

hg gofmt must automatically format the changed files, create a codereview ticket in
rietveld and upload the changed files.


What do you see instead?

Error message as below:
abort: gofmt: exceptions.AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'spawnvp'


Which operating system are you using?
Windows OS

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
devel (hg tip at changeset: 14149:90c9121e26c3)
